name: any_mod_all
description: Collect all the mods for a table

name: ba_curses
description: Trigger all 3 curses in one game and lift them

description: Load the bases then hit a home run

name: ba_natural
description: Hit a Natural Cycle (in order: single, double, triple and home run)

name: ba_oldboard
description: Hit a home run in the Batting Cage mini-game

name: ba_skillshot
description: Hit 3 skill shots in one game

name: bg_500_pocket
description: Launch the ball into the 500 pocket

name: bg_double_points
description: Get in the 2x pocket twice in a game

name: bg_match_color
description: Shoot 4 balls into matching color pockets

name: bg_no_bottom
description: Complete a game without any balls falling into the bottom slots

name: br_layout_time
description: Complete a level in less than 20 seconds

name: ca_mh_bumpers
description: Hit 250 bumpers in the Mirror House

name: ca_mini_mission
description: Complete the 3 mini-missions in one game: Bumpers, Targets and Captures

name: ca_super_spinner
description: Complete Super Spin advanced mode: activate the mode and get 200 gate flips in 60 seconds

name: sp_shootufo
description: Shoot down 5 UFOs during the Defend mode

name: sp_small_loop
description: Ride the Inner Gravity Loop 3 times in a row

name: sp_small_loop_2
description: Ride the Inner Gravity Loop 4 times in a row

name: sp_small_loop_3
description: Ride the Inner Gravity Loop 6 times in a row

name: un_deepdive
description: Fill the O2 tank and go on a deep dive

name: un_jellyfish
description: Find and collect 20 jellyfish specimens for your tank

name: un_sub_targets
description: Hit 20 unlit targets in the submarine

name: un_sub_targets_2
description: Hit 100 unlit targets in the submarine

name: un_sub_targets_3
description: Hit 500 unlit targets in the submarine

name: ww_all_missions
description: Complete the missions for each of the 6 towns in one game

name: ww_cows
description: Find and return 10 cows to the Jackson's Ranch

name: ww_spin
description: Hit 100 bumpers during the Spin mode

name: ap_skillshots
description: Hit the skillshots in both configuration 4A and 4B in one game

name: ap_tank_multiball
description: Achieve 5 ramp multiballs in a game

name: ap_all_nodes
description: Configure all 17 combinations in one game

name: ap_skill_checks
description: Complete each Skill Test mini-game (across multiple games)

name: tw_scarcity
description: Complete production of goods with a maxed demand gauge

name: tw_motherlode
description: Have all mining balls active at once (on either panel)

name: tw_catchme
description: Perfect + Speedy pirate evasion with at least a 2 Jolly Roger difficulty

name: tw_monopoly
description: Successfully complete a Special Delivery of 2 different finished goods at once

name: tw_monopoly_2
description: Successfully complete a Special Delivery of 3 different finished goods at once

name: tw_monopoly_3
description: Successfully complete a Special Delivery of 4 different finished goods at once

name: cj_perfect
description: Play only perfect notes in a Rhythm minigame

name: cj_passthru
description: Make the Perfect Pitch shot while "SUPER" is lit

name: go_course_par
description: Complete a course with par or less

name: go_meteor
description: Get 2 meteor multiball in one game

name: go_drive
description: Drive a ball at least 2700 yards
